main event: A 12-year-old boy observed two unidentified objects in Silver Springs, Maryland, which appeared stationary while other objects were moving.
interesting points: The witness observed the objects for about 10-12 seconds,The objects were described as red-orange in color, approximately 50 ft in diameter, and estimated to be 300 ft above ground,The sighting occurred on a clear night with the moon visible,The report was part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings in the 1950s and 1960s,The witness was not alone; he confirmed another individual also saw the objects.
witness description: 12-year-old male, experienced with Scout troop but limited previous sightings
